GapFillInput.Title: Superlative adjectives
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the adjective in brackets into the superlative. Type the answers in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Where's the best (good) beach near here?
2. What’s the most difficult (difficult) language to learn?
3. What’s the name of your youngest (young) child?
4. What was the most successful (successful) song of all time?
5. What’s the busiest (busy) day in your office?
6. When is the earliest (early) bus to the airport?
7. Where’s the biggest (big) swimming pool in the city?
8. What time is the worst (bad) traffic?
9. Who’s the richest (rich) sportsman or woman in your country?
10. Where’s the largest (large) cinema in the world?
